domain.resources

Class Time

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.resources.Time

  • public class Time
extends java.lang.Object
    This is used by other systems to keep track of how much time passes. Because of how the system works (prompts for user input on one thread), this class proves to be vital for managing a system.
    See Also:
    Wave, SystemsController

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static long currentTime
      How much time has passed since initTime.
      private static long initTime
      The time when the Game initialized.
      private static long waveTime
      For how long time the wave elapses.
